channel.title: Map suggestion thread
channel.description:
I got the idea, of a thread where we can share our map ideas. Maps for CS: S, TF2, Day of Defeat and so on.
I start: de_townsquare
A bomb defusal map, surrounded by many buildings, lots of roads to take to the bombsite, both for CT'S and T'S. HDR and Militia skybox would fit.
Your turn!

item.title: Map suggestion thread

item.description:
Abandoned ww2 island with base and underground tunnels.

Read full topic

item.title: Map suggestion thread
item.dc:creator: Wark
item.description:
Ibanez:

Mind showing some pictures of de_mist? I’ve always had a soft spot for foggy maps set on freeways or old man-made structures.

Here are the screens of de_mist. I had the fog turned off in this build for testing and having trouble finding the original vmf at the moment. (This was made like 4 years ago)

This map was made before I started using custom assets in source, way back in the day. de_greenhills took place afterwards and was a hospital mid-renovation, so it had a few of the industrial bits.

I believe you’ve seen a bit of edge, and I’m working on a Silent Hill esque mod right now with lots of interesting architecture.

Thanks for the interest. Looking for a larger scale mod to help on if you happen to know any. Applied for BM way back in 2005 I believe, but didn’t get in because I admittedly sucked balls then. Peace

Read full topic

item.title: Map suggestion thread
item.dc:creator: Wark
item.description:
I’ve made a few maps that will never see the light of day, so what the hell.

de_greenhills was a hospital map with bombsites in the waiting and OR areas. Had lots of custom assets and teams would spawn at opposing parking lots. Had some pretty nifty features, one was a revolving door which in the end didn’t work well with any sort of ping.

de_mist was a Denver freeway overpass and irrigation system with bombsites in the control room and pump areas. Pine trees and cliffsides.

de_edge I’m still working on, but it’s a mall in the style of mirrors edge. Did some custom modern furniture and very clean bright colorful textures and storefront signs. Looking pretty good.

Read full topic
